summary: Harden ProxySQL temp-table routing reconciliation during deploys

changes.description: Deploy-time ProxySQL query-rule reconciliation now retries both known admin credentials and restores the broader temp-table writer rule used by the stack template. This prevents Magento `search_tmp_*`, `_tmp_*`, `_temp_*`, and `TEMPORARY` table reads from being misrouted to replicas after deploys, which was surfacing as missing temp-table exceptions on kit-builder pages.
